page.title: 16ONE DAY IN OUR FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: The first person in our family of five is up by 6.30.Soon afterwards everyone is busy preparing to leave the house by 8 o'clock. First to leave is father,who commutes 20 miles to the edge of Birmingham.He is not seen again until early evening at the earliest.The eldest child travels by coach to a middle school in Redditch,and returns by 3.30.The youngest child spends her day with a childminder while the middle child attends Inkberrow First School,where her mother works.The family meet again for an evening meal.The two elder children then go out to cricket and gymnastic classes.As they return home they read or do homework before going to bed.Jobs are done and everything is made ready for the next day.All is quiet by 11 o'clock.
